Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to certifying recovery living residences
Summary: Provides the commissioner of mental health may authorize the certification of recovery living residences and provide a list of such residences on the department of mental hygiene's website.
LawCode: Add ยง32.05-a, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to certifying recovery living residences
